评论详情: I love this blouse. I get a lot of compliments every time I wear it & my husband loves it on me too. I wash it in a garment bag on gentle & then air dry. Wrinkles steam out of it very easily too. The crocheted parts do tend to snag on bracelets & purse buckles & buttons though so just beware.

You will find that there are any number of combinations that work. It can be used as a bathing suit coverup too,if you like. Good price and well made. Cordially, by patty
